org.apache.paimon.flink.source.align

Class AlignedContinuousFileSplitEnumerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.paimon.flink.source.ContinuousFileSplitEnumerator
      • org.apache.paimon.flink.source.align.AlignedContinuousFileSplitEnumerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, org.apache.flink.api.common.state.CheckpointListener, org.apache.flink.api.connector.source.SplitEnumerator<FileStoreSourceSplit,PendingSplitsCheckpoint>

    public class AlignedContinuousFileSplitEnumerator
extends ContinuousFileSplitEnumerator
    An aligned continuously monitoring enumerator. It requires checkpoint to be aligned with snapshot.

    There are two alignment cases here:

    • The snapshot has been consumed, but the checkpoint has not yet been triggered: AlignedSourceReader will not request splits until checkpoint is triggered.
    • The checkpoint has been triggered, but the snapshot has not yet been produced: The checkpoint will block until the snapshot of the upstream table is generated or times out.
